title: Bare idea: Ditch socks this season, let the 'mankle' show
text:
Ruchika Kher, Hindustan Times , Mumbai | Updated: Sep 02, 2015 22:42 IST 
It is time to give your socks a break. Our male celebrities are not refraining from showing off their ankles anymore, giving rise to the ‘mankle’ trend.Ranveer Singh never ceases to surprise us with his quirky sartorial choices. He was one of the first celebs to wear his pants half-mast, leading the ankle-showing trend in India. 
At a recent show, designer Narendra Kumar reaffirmed the fact that shorter pants and the trend of showing off ankles will be in vogue even in the next season.Amit Sadh ditched the formal shoes and went in for loafers and shorter trousers to give us a good view of his ankles. 
Cricketer Irfan Pathan was seen bundling up in style in cuffed up chinos paired with a formal blue blazer. 
While Bollywood newcomer Sooraj Pancholi also recently walked at a fashion show in a long blazer and pants that are in line with the new mankle trend. Tags
